title: In case of Regional Plan area, 100% premium charges shall be paid to Government through the District offices of Town Planning and Valuation Department
clause_text: In case of Regional Plan area, 100% premium charges shall be paid to Government through the District offices of Town Planning and Valuation Department.
section: (#) Premium Charges and Fire Infrastructure Charges.
